summary: A simple Kingdom Hearts Moon and Sun.
descriptionHtml:
This is a moon edit, based on the original mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2093]Kingdom Hearts Moon[/url], however mine uses the actual texture from Kingdom Hearts II (Not actual, just improvised from the original) [i]and[/i] includes phases. There is an optional sun to use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=116]Skyrim Sunglare[/url], however if you don\'t the files, you can just not extract them.

I also recommend using [url=skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5274]No Secunda Moon[/url] as why would Kingdom Hearts exist if another moon existed anyways?
author: Erry

files.name: Kingdom Hearts Moon and Sun - v1
